actions.text: Amendment SA 4558 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4558 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S7387; text: CR S7387) To prohibit the expenditure of appropriated funds to enforce or comply with the limitation on the number of Transportation Security Administration employees, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4558 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4558 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lautenberg.

purpose: To prohibit the expenditure of appropriated funds to enforce or comply with the limitation on the number of Transportation Security Administration employees, and for other purposes.
